About Us

Leading HVAC Design & Drafting Experts in Sydney

Orbit Engineering Services

Orbit Engineering Services Pty Ltd is an Australian-owned and operated HVAC design and drafting company based in Sydney, NSW.
We specialise in mechanical services drafting, BIM modelling, coordination, and design documentation for projects of all sizes — from residential developments to large commercial and infrastructure projects.
With more than 18 years of industry experience, we have built a reputation for delivering high-quality, accurate, and cost-effective HVAC documentation that meets Australian Standards and client expectations.
Our journey began in 2005, when our founder started working in Australia as an HVAC Design Draftsperson and Revit Modeller with leading Tier 1 companies such as Hastie Australia and MMM Group.
After gaining extensive local experience in design, coordination, and project delivery, he established Orbit Engineering Services in 2018 to provide reliable and efficient drafting support to HVAC contractors and consultants.
Today, Orbit Engineering Services has grown into a collaborative international team, with ten highly skilled drafters and modellers in India and two professionals in Australia, working together to provide precise drafting and BIM solutions from LOD 200 to LOD 500.
Our team uses the latest design technologies and BIM platforms to ensure seamless coordination, efficient communication, and high-quality deliverables for every project.

Our Commitment

We are committed to:
Understanding client requirements.
Delivering accurate documentation.
Providing timely solutions.

Our Vision

To be one of Australia’s most trusted HVAC drafting partners.

Our Projects Include

Shopping Centres and Retail Developments

High-Rise Residential and Commercial Buildings
Metro Stations and Infrastructure Projects.

Our Projects

The Sutherland Hospital

We successfully delivered detailed HVAC drafting for the Sutherland Hospital Operating Theatre Upgrade, featuring 12 new operating theatres, 3 wards, isolation rooms, and a kitchen.

View Details →

East Sydney Private Hospital – Level 6 Upgrade

East Sydney Private Hospital has a total capacity of 8 operating theatres and 40 beds, including general and private rooms.

View Details →

Genesis Care Maui Oncology Frenchs Forest NSW

We successfully delivered detailed HVAC drafting services for our client on the Genesis Care Maui Oncology project at Frenchs Forest, a state-of-the-art medical consulting facility.

View Details →

Our Services

HVAC BIM Modelling (LOD200 - LOD500)

We develop high-quality 3D BIM models for HVAC systems with the required Level of Development (LOD 200–500), ensuring every component is accurately represented for design, coordination, fabrication, and facility management purposes.

Learn More →

Coordination and Clash Detection

Our team ensures complete integration of HVAC systems with architectural, structural, and other MEP disciplines. Using advanced coordination tools, we detect and resolve clashes early, reducing rework and ensuring a smooth construction process.

Learn More →

Documentation and Shop Drawings

We produce detailed mechanical drawings, schedules, and fabrication documents directly from the BIM model, maintaining precision and consistency. All documentation follows client standards and project specifications for seamless on-site execution.

Learn More →

Site Survey and As-Built Verification

We provide on-site survey and verification services to ensure that installations match the approved BIM model. As-built models are updated to reflect real-world conditions, supporting accurate facility handover and asset management.

Learn More →
